bibl.title: Ptolemaic Wills.

Legal Documents of the Hellenistic World. Papers from a Seminar arranged by the Institute of Classical Studies, the Institute of Jewish Studies and the Warburg Institute, University of London, February to May 1986
bibl.author: CLARYSSE, Willy

bibl.note: I. The Greek diathekai [especially the Petrie wills and the wills of Dryton]. - II. Graeco-Egyptian 'last wills'. - Appendix.

Markham J. GELLER and Herwig MAEHLER, in collaboration with A.D.E. LEWIS (Edd.), Legal Documents of the Hellenistic World. Papers from a Seminar arranged by the Institute of Classical Studies, the Institute of Jewish Studies and the Warburg Institute, University of London, February to May 1986 (London, 1995) pp. 88-105, 1 tabl.
